text: The Salzburg Connection is a 1972 American thriller movie directed by Lee H. Katzin and based on the 1968 novel of the same name by Helen MacInnes. It stars Barry Newman, Patrick Jordan, Anna Karina, Klaus Maria Brandauer, Karen Jensen, Wolfgang Preiss, Raoul Retzer and was distributed by 20th Century Fox. ==Other websites== * * Category:1972 thriller movies Category:1970s spy movies Category:American thriller movies Category:Movies based on books Category:20th Century Fox movies Category:Movies directed by Lee H. Katzin Category:Movies set in Austria
title: The Salzburg Connection
